data: Slowly on Morningside Heights rises the Cathedral of St. John the Divine: standing on a high rock under the Northern sky above the long wash of the untroubled sea, above the wash of the troubled waves of men.
Morningside Heights | Cathedral of St. John the Divine | Northern sky
Morningside Heights | Cathedral of St. John the Divine | high rock
Allen, James Lane, 1849-1925; Ivanowski, Sigismond de, 1875-1944 [Illustrator]
